moves.name: Defog
moves.effect: Clears the entire field of terrain effects. Clears all field effects from the opponents’ field of play. Lowers the target’s evasiveness.

moves.name: Spotlight, Please!
moves.effect: Makes opponents target the user for a short time. Drastically raises the user’s Defense. Raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Atk.

syncMove.name: Miracle Idol Draco Meteor
syncMove.description: Become Mega Altaria until the end of battle. This move’s power increases if there are no field effects on the opponents’ field of play and also no effects on the entire field of play, including weather or terrain effects.

passives.name: Revenge Boost 9
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.

passives.name: HP Trade-Off 5
passives.description: The less HP the user has remaining, the more it powers up moves.

passives.name: Pressure Cooker 1
passives.description: Once per battle, has a small chance of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when in a pinch.

grid.bonus: Twister:Aggravation 1- Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.
Twister:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dragon Pulse:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dragon Pulse:Acumen 9- Raises the user’s Sp. Def when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.
Moonblast:On a Roll 1- Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.
Moonblast:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Defog:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Defog:Clear View 1- Lowers the evasiveness of the currently targeted opponent when Defog is successful.
Spotlight, Please!:Durable 9- Makes the user able to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP when a move is successful.
Snow Shelter- Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.
Sand Shelter- Protects the Pokémon from damage from a sandstorm.
On the Ropes 3- Reduces damage when the Pokémon is in a pinch and is hit by a physical attack move.
Natural Remedy- Once per battle, removes all status conditions from the user when the user is inflicted by any status condition.
Harry 3- Powers up moves when the target is flinching.
Double Down 2- Powers up sync moves that are super effective.
HP Trade-Off 4- The less HP the user has remaining, the more it powers up moves.
Wide Open- The more the target’s evasiveness has been lowered, the more it powers up moves.
Witty Comeback 3- Once per battle, drastically raises the user’s Sp. Def in a pinch.
